head.title: to whom has Yahweh’s saving power been revealed? [Note: should be 3-2-1]

concepts.content: to whom has Yahweh’s saving power been revealed? (1b)

His servant grew up before him like a tender young plant. He grew like a root coming up out of dry ground. He didn’t have any beauty or majesty that made us notice him. There wasn’t anything special about the way he looked that drew us to him. (2)

head.title: Who will believe our message? He will be sprinkle many nations (with His blood)!

concepts.content: Many people were shocked when they saw him. (52:14a)
He was so scarred that he did not look like a man at all. His body was so twisted that he did not look like a human being anymore.  (52:14b)
He will be sprinkle many nations (with His blood). (52:15a)
Kings will be so amazed that they will not be able to say anything. (52:15b)
They will see things they were never told about. They will understand the meaning of things they never heard about. (52:15c)
Who has believed what we’ve been saying? (53:1a)

head.title: The Vision of the Son of Man and the First Four Letters

concepts.content: Son of Man: Eyes flame of fire, feet of burnished bronze (1:13-15)
First and Last, living one, Died and Alive forevermore (1:18)
Ephesus: Seven stars and Golden lampstands
Smyrna: First and Last, Died and Came to Life
Thyatira: Son of God: Eyes a flame of fire, feet of burnished bronze

head.title: The Seven-fold Description of Christ and the Book of Revelation

concepts.content: Head of White Hair-               Chapter 1         Jesus is revealed
Eyes of Fire –            Chapters 2-3       Jesus evaluates the Churches
Feet of Burnished Bronze –         Chapters 4-5        Jesus ascends to the Throne
Voice of Roaring Waters –     Chapters 6-7         Jesus opens the book of judgment
Hand with Seven Stars –        Chapters 8-14      Jesus upholds the Church in tribulation
Mouth with Two-edged Sword –          Chapters 15-19   Jesus' descends and judges His enemies
Face-Shining like the Sun –         Chapters 20-22  Jesus and His glorified Bride
